Replying to @serrynaimo 2018-07-27 10:59
@serrynaimo You can set headers in either netlify.toml or in a _headers file. https://t.co/Re1E3LtmKh I tend to favour using a netlify.toml file myself, as it keep various configs in one place, and it can sit in your project root instead if needing to find its way to your deploy directory.
